content.question: In relation to the passage as a whole, the narrator’s comments about “Nature” in the second paragraph (“Oh, who . . . centuries”) portray

choices.label: an attraction to imagining life among Nature inaccurately
an objective understanding of the natural world
a limited interest in the complex processes at work in Nature
a realistic understanding of Nature’s indifference to humanity

content.answer: an attraction to imagining life among Nature inaccurately

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain how a narrator's reliability affects a narrative.
